periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 1pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 71, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 7pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy. Low around 40, with temperatures rising to around 44 overnight. West northwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.shortForecast: Rain Showers Likely then Mostly Sunny
periods.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 7am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 51. Northwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 31. Northwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

periods.name: Monday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 61. South southwest wind 2 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

periods.name: Monday Night

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 70. South wind 14 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 36 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday Night

periods.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 1am, then a slight chance of rain and snow showers. Partly cloudy, with a low around 36. West wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

periods.name: Friday
